CS GO is an awesome game.  The dynamics are actually quite good and the game play is fun. The rank up system is broken though, and cheaters run the show.

I have played against blatant spin-botters that are ranked up to LEM, which then causes me to de-rank a level.

If you enjoy being shot by a scout through 9 walls across the map, then CS GO is for you.

OR, if you love trading, skins, and the Operations that come out sometimes, then that works to.

But if you want to play this game seriously and competitively, then load up ESEA or FACEIT.  MM is for trolls.

Otherwise you will end up playing with trolling cheaters at least 80% of the time; which occurs 100% on all maps.

Enjoy wishing you starting playing 1.6 instead.

-shock
